00062 class AttributeSet
00063 {
00064 public:
00065     enum { INVALID_POS = boost::integer_traits<size_t>::const_max };
00066

00077     struct Util
00078     {
00080         struct NameAndType {
00081             NameAndType(const std::string& n, const NamePair& t)
00082                 : name(n), type(t) {}
00083             Name name;
00084             NamePair type;
00085         };
00086 
00087         typedef std::vector<NameAndType> NameAndTypeVec;
00088     };

00217 class AttributeSet::Descriptor
00218 {
00219 public:
00220     typedef boost::shared_ptr<Descriptor> Ptr;
00221     typedef std::map<std::string, size_t> NameToPosMap;
00222     typedef NameToPosMap::const_iterator  ConstIterator;
00223 
00224     typedef Util::NameAndType             NameAndType;
00225     typedef Util::NameAndTypeVec          NameAndTypeVec;
00226 
00228     struct Inserter {
00229         NameAndTypeVec vec;
00230         Inserter& add(const NameAndType& nameAndType) {
00231             vec.push_back(nameAndType); return *this;
00232         }
00233         Inserter& add(const Name& name, const NamePair& type) {
00234             vec.push_back(NameAndType(name, type)); return *this;
00235         }
00236         Inserter& add(const NameAndTypeVec& other) {
00237             for (NameAndTypeVec::const_iterator it = other.begin(), itEnd = other.end(); it != itEnd; ++it) {
00238                 vec.push_back(NameAndType(it->name, it->type));
00239             }
00240             return *this;
00241         }
00242     };
00243 
00245 
00246     Descriptor();
00247 
00249     static Ptr create(const NameAndTypeVec&);
00250 
00252     static Ptr create(const NamePair&);
00253 
00254     Ptr duplicateAppend(const NameAndType& attribute) const;
00255     Ptr duplicateAppend(const NameAndTypeVec& vec) const;
00256     Ptr duplicateDrop(const std::vector<size_t>& pos) const;
00257 
00259     size_t size() const { return mTypes.size(); }
00260 
00262     size_t memUsage() const;
00263 
00266     size_t find(const std::string& name) const;
00267 
00269     size_t rename(const std::string& fromName, const std::string& toName);
00270 
00272     const std::string& valueType(size_t pos) const;
00274     const NamePair& type(size_t pos) const;
00275 
00277     bool operator==(const Descriptor&) const;
00279     bool operator!=(const Descriptor& rhs) const { return !this->operator==(rhs); }
00280 
00282     const NameToPosMap& map() const { return mNameMap; }
00283 
00285     void appendTo(NameAndTypeVec& attrs) const;
00286 
00288     void write(std::ostream&) const;
00290     void read(std::istream&);
00291 
00292 private:
00293     size_t insert(const std::string& name, const NamePair& typeName);
00294     NameToPosMap                mNameMap;
00295     std::vector<NamePair>       mTypes;
00296 }; // class Descriptor
